mapper.update: update t_tempcartecontent set TCI_Swift_Number = #{tciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TCC_Dish_ID = #{tccDishId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCC_Dish_Num = #{tccDishNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCC_Total_Price = #{tccTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCC_Specil_Desc = #{tccSpecilDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_SubTime = #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where TCC_ID = #{tccId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select TCC_ID, TCI_Swift_Number, TCC_Dish_ID, TCC_Dish_Num, TCC_Total_Price, TCC_Specil_Desc, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_tempcartecontent where TCC_ID = #{tccId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
